Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing W2 Reminder
Properties.Description: The second reminder that's sent if someone has shown interest in the baptism class but not completed video 1, and also the most recent activity is the week one reminder.

Properties.Name: ACTI: Process Requests Needing W3 Reminder
Process Requests Needing W3 Reminder
Properties.Description: The third reminder that's sent if someone has shown interest in the baptism class but not completed video 1, and also the most recent activity is the week two reminder.

Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing Inactivation
Properties.Description: If all three reminder have been ignored with no progress made in the course and it was seven days since the last reminder, this activity will inactivate the connection request and close the class workflow .
